title: Brick Lane - The first sentence and Chanu's words

content.question: The first sentence of the passage and the words spoken by Chanu in the second paragraph (“I’ve spent...around”) indicate that he

choices.label: is largely apprehensive about the outside world
has had priorities other than pleasure for much of his life
secretly dislikes the city in which he lives
finds it challenging to navigate city streets

content.answer: has had priorities other than pleasure for much of his life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
